alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Grant; Jefferson; Lonoke; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 18 at 2:26AM CDT until June 18 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LONOKE...NORTHEASTERN GRANT...SOUTH CENTRAL FAULKNER...NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...SOUTHEASTERN SALINE AND PULASKI COUNTIES... At 226 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mayflower to Oak Grove in Pulaski County to near Scott to near Hensley Island, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Conway... Pine Bluff... Sherwood... Jacksonville... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Downtown Little Rock... North Little Rock Airport... Little Rock AFB... Southwest Little Rock... White Hall... England... Mayflower... Wrightsville... Argenta... Redfield... Altheimer... Keo... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Faulkner; Grant; Jefferson; Lonoke; Pulaski; Saline
